metadata.taskDesc: Dynamically Synthesize Agents and Orchestrate Information Passing
metadata.agentDesc: Dynamically Synthesize Agents and Orchestrate Information Passing

metadata.taskDesc: Fetch the latest Technical Specifications (TS) related to the Evolved Packet System (EPS) from the 3GPP FTP server.
metadata.agentDesc: The 3GPP Standards Specialist is responsible for retrieving the most recent Technical Specifications related to the Evolved Packet System from the 3GPP FTP server, ensuring the documents are relevant and up-to-date.

metadata.taskDesc: Fetch the latest Technical Reports (TR) related to the Evolved Packet System (EPS) from the 3GPP FTP server.
metadata.agentDesc: The 3GPP Standards Specialist is responsible for retrieving the most recent Technical Reports related to the Evolved Packet System from the 3GPP FTP server, ensuring the documents are relevant and up-to-date.

metadata.taskDesc: Based on the Technical Specifications fetched in task_1, summarize the key information and insights.
metadata.agentDesc: The Technical Documentation Specialist will analyze the Technical Specifications obtained from task_1 and summarize the key points, focusing on the main technical aspects of the EPS.

metadata.taskDesc: Based on the Technical Reports fetched in task_2, summarize the key information and insights.
metadata.agentDesc: The Technical Documentation Specialist will analyze the Technical Reports obtained from task_2 and summarize the key points, focusing on the main findings and recommendations related to the EPS.

metadata.taskDesc: Based on the summaries from task_3 and task_4, compare and analyze the insights to highlight discrepancies or unique findings between the specifications and reports.
metadata.agentDesc: The Market Researcher will compare the insights from the Technical Specifications and Technical Reports, identifying any discrepancies or unique findings that may impact the understanding of the EPS.
